nodes.title: Prevent enabling shaders in the GUI when no packs are present
Add keybinds to open the shaderpack selection screen and toggle shaders
Update README.md compared to recent changes in Iris
Make FrameUpdateNotifier an instance variable of DeferredWorldRenderingPipeline (fixes DOF reload crash)
Do not render a shadow for the transparent spectator head when player is in spectator
Allow debugging version of sodium branch to launch
Add a warning when the current shader pack uses unimplemented features
Fixed crash when reloading a shader that uses DOF, specifically centerDepthSmooth.
Added Brazilian Portuguese language and fixed innacuracies.
Add Enable/Disable Shaders GUI Option and Fix Bugs
Add system information to log file
Update README to remove the nonexistent Iris branch
Add a Shader Pack Selection UI
Add the parser for custom uniforms
Update sodium-compatibility to latest trunk changes
Properties conditional directive and macro parser in IdMap
Add a shaderpack selection GUI and Mod Menu config GUI
Allow for completely turning off shaders and using vanilla rendering
Update README.md according to the advances made
Update README.md to show sodium fork dependency for sodium-compatibility branch
Make camera in fluid check use actual camera position
[Actions] Build any branch, cache Gradle packages and save artifacts
Added the abillity to see the currently loaded shader in the options menu
Add Reload Shaders Keybind and language data parsing
Add properties uniforms and add back IdMapParser

Add properties uniforms and add back IdMapParser

Add the lightmap to the terrain shader

Use ModifyVariable for entity list sorting

Add isEyeInCave hardcoded uniform and uniforms for Complementary's biome check
Add code for registering Iris-exclusive defines and uniforms
Use bottom Y offset for end portal rendering
Add caching policy to github action, and filter built files
Add option to bundle with sodium to gradle

Save shadow render distance to configuration file
Add option to bundle with sodium to gradle

Dragon death progress + new code for Iris exclusive defines/uniforms
Add fallback path in case the atlassize didn't get stored
Run the IntelliJ code formatter on all code
Run the IntelliJ formatter on all code
Fix overlay texture unit, fixes hit flash without shaders
Update to Loom 0.9, yarn build 32, and link in gradle.properties
Allow Sodium to store block entity information about the shadow pass
Physics Mod compatibility, alongside mod loading checks.
Fix shaders using the wrong time when in a dimension with fixed time
Fix dirty issue by ignoring macOS files (like .DS_Store)
Update README.md Added A Brillient Shader !
Add enableLogging option and enable by default in a development environment
Don't allocate a vec2 for every tile in the atlas

updated for the 1.17 release with sodium fork

edited to reflect the public release
